section.docs: Announcements are sent out to all users. Only certain users can create announcements. All users in the account will receive an email when one is posted. A user can dimiss the announcement. The person who posted it can change it or delete it.

section.title: Routes & Permissions
section.docs:
* `POST /announcements`: Team leaders * `GET /announcements`: All Users * `GET /announcements/:id`: All users * `PUT /announcements/:id`: The poster * `DELETE /announcements/:id`: The poster * `POST /announcements/:id/dismiss`: All users
### Scoping
Only non-dismissed announcements are accessible via `GET`

section.title: Response Format
section.docs:
<dl> <dt>title</dt> <dd>The title for the announcment.</dd>
<dt>message</dt> <dd>The text for the announcement. Can be as long as required.</dd>
<dt>comments</dt> <dd>All the comments for this announcement.</dd>
<dt>user</dt> <dd>ID of the user who posted this announcement</dd> </dl>
